title: Cats and dogs
creator_credit: Jack Sholder and Paul R. Gurian
brief_description: The relationship between a man and woman is explored in a series of episodes which reveal much about them and about their attitude to each other. There is both comedy and futility in their arguments - she is concerned with understanding and developing a deeper relationship while he is impatient with her intellectualizing of the situation.
